subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Barcelona swept aside Real Valladolid, 3-0, to move 8 points clear at the top of La Liga, reaching the midpoint of the season unbeaten for the first time.
snippet: Barcelona swept aside Real Valladolid, 3-0, to move 8 points clear at the top of La Liga, reaching the midpoint of the season unbeaten for the first time.
